title: until lee and yasuo are unplayable the qq won't stop
body:
that's just how the bronze legion operates 

bitch till you get your way

replies.body: >{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} implying even for a second that the bitching and moaning ever stops
true, they could be unviable and someone would come in bitching that the only yasuo or lee that they've seen in 100 games demolished them, then you look at the match history and the yas/lee is 0/10
With the current nuke meta I almost think they are both balanced...

Then they will get replaced by bullshit point and click zero counterplay champions and people will bitch and moan all over again.

http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-tn4QqSpBH7c/Toxm33PMnmI/AAAAAAAAA58/GjrZUXEEm9g/s1600/face+pressed+up+to+the+glass.JPG

It's funny because that's what 10 bans will do. 

Is it sad that I'm actually looking forward to the Chaos?
I don't think that's entirely true. Lee bitching pretty much stopped when he wasn't dominating the jg for a couple weeks there, and he was still plenty viable.
